title: 820-2915 No Backlight
message:
No liquid. 

Found that I am missing BKL_PWM. I have already replaced U9701 and R9704. Still have the same result. Most recently replaced U9600, also same result. 
SMC_LID is 3.38V.

Thanks.

title: 820-2915 No Backlight
message:
Try PRAM reset few times.
Do you know if this machine has EFI password?
Use external monitor for control.

title: 820-2915 No Backlight
message: Jump BKLT_PWM for permanent full brightness it's going to have a dead GPU tomorrow anyways.

title: 820-2915 No Backlight
message: Ok , so I got it working.. . Just not sure what did it. I tried PRAM Reset as suggested when I came in this morning (Please not that U9701 is removed at this time) and I still did not get a response from the Muix to send LCD_BKLT_PWM. However I decided to put a second new U9701 on and I booted and everything works , LCD_BKLT_PWM is now present and I have a machine with backlight. Maybe the second reboot after replacing U901 got the Mux to send the signal? Or will it not send it without U9701 present. In that case it was a faulty Mux. Thanks your help guys!
